comment: Note: variables related to plantation forests are set to 'no-data' values to reflect that although the underlying IAM scenarios might include plantation forests, the harmonized LUH3 data does not provide any information on these variables at this stage.
institution: University of Maryland (UofMD), College Park, MD 20742, USA

references: Hurtt et al. 2020 (https://doi.org/10.5194/gmd-13-5425-2020), Chini et al. 2021 (https://doi.org/10.5194/essd-13-4175-2021)
source: LUH3-VL V1: Land-Use Harmonization Data Set for VL Scenario in CMIP7
